title: Reaction to Lance Zierlein's Mock Draft
itunes:title: Reaction to Lance Zierlein's Mock Draft
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Lance Zierlein are back with a new special episode. To start off, the guys react to Lance’s mock draft and break it down (:50). After that, the trio emphasize the importance of marrying free agency with the draft (49:19). To wrap up the show, the guys talk about the importance of setting the draft board before the combine (51:29).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
